title: Mentoring Competency Enhancement Program for New Teachers Based on Educational Models

context.prior_knowledge: Basic teaching experience and foundational knowledge in science education
context.additional_context: Concurrent action research applying and analyzing mentoring practices in educational settings, with formative assessment using smartphone-based collaborative tools

learning_goals: Problems occurring in educational settings can be systematically diagnosed, and improvement solutions can be proposed for novice teachers.

Learners develop 3 practical strategies for mentor-mentee mutual growth using an educational model-based mentoring framework (e.g., KBPM model), apply them to ≥2 field cases, and achieve ≥80% satisfaction in pre-post evaluation surveys.
Mentoring cases are documented via action research methodology, and competencies are continuously enhanced through reflective practice.

resources: Science Education Teaching and Learning Resources
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
